definition: to obscure the facts (idiom); to mislead the public with prevarication and deliberate falsehoods
lit. chasing the wind and clutching at shadows (idiom); fig. groundless accusations/to act on hearsay evidence
to compile/to draw up/to fabricate/to invent/to concoct/to make up/to cook up
to spread falsehoods/to increasingly distort the truth/to pile errors on top of errors (idiom)
to sensationalize (idiom); deliberate exaggeration to scare people
